definition.name: Build Azure Virtual Machine Image
definition.description: Create custom virtual machine images that contain artifacts built in CI workflows
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: location
inputs.description: This is the Azure region in which the Image Builder will run.

inputs.name: resource-group-name
inputs.description: This is the Resource Group where the temporary Imagebuilder Template resource will be created.

inputs.name: image-builder-template-name
inputs.description: The name of the image builder template resource to be used for creating and running the Image builder service.

inputs.name: build-timeout-in-minutes
inputs.description: The value is an integer which is used as timeout in minutes for running the image build.

inputs.name: vm-size
inputs.description: You can override the VM size, from the default value i.e. Standard_D1_v2.

inputs.name: managed-identity
inputs.description: The identity that will be used to do the role assignment and resource creation

inputs.name: source-image
inputs.description: Value of source-image supported by Azure Image Builder.

inputs.name: customizer-source
inputs.description: This takes the path to a directory or a file in the runner. By default, it points to the default download directory of the github runner.

inputs.name: customizer-script
inputs.description: The customer can enter multi inline powershell or shell commands and use variables to point to directories inside the downloaded location.

inputs.name: customizer-windows-update
inputs.description: The value is boolean and set to false by default. This value is for Windows images only, the image builder will run Windows Update at the end of the customizations and also handle the reboots it requires.

inputs.name: dist-resource-id
inputs.description: Image Resource Id to be created by AIB

inputs.name: dist-location
inputs.description: location of Image created by AIB

inputs.name: run-output-name
inputs.description: Every Image builder run is identified with a unique run id.

inputs.name: dist-image-tags
inputs.description: The values set will be used to set the user defined tags on the custom image artifact created.

outputs.name: imagebuilder-run-status
outputs.description: This value of this output will be the value of Image builder Run status set to either Succeeded or Failed based on the runState returned by Azure Image Builder.

outputs.name: run-output-name
outputs.description: The action emits output value run-output-name which can be used to get the details of the Image Builder Run.

outputs.name: custom-image-uri
outputs.description: Upon successful completion, The github action emits the URI or resource id of the Image distributed.

latest_release.name: Updating new set of locations for AIB
